document.full_text: an arkansas man was sentenced on friday to eight years and four months in prison for helping run what prosecutors called an $80 million ponzi scheme involving automated teller machines that were never bought.
document.title: u.s. man gets 8 years prison in $80 million atm ponzi scam
lines_and_colors: an arkansas man was sentenced on friday to eight years and four months in prison for helping run what prosecutors called an $80 million ponzi scheme involving automated teller machines that were never bought.
